columns_description.index: zero-based index of the sentence in the document, (primary key)
columns_description.segment: text segment where the sentence is located
columns_description.sentimentValue: detected sentiment of the sentence, from an interval _\[-1.0; 1.0\]_
columns_description.sentimentPolarity: detected sentiment of the sentence (_-1_, _0_ or _1_)
columns_description.sentimentLabel: sentiment of the sentence as a label (_negative_, _neutral_ or _positive_)
